title: Capital One Brings Back Venture’s $1K Bonus, Plus JetBlue Transfers
description: For a limited time, new Capital One Venture cardholders can earn a $250 credit in addition to a welcome bonus.
author: Sara Rathner
excerpt: For a limited time, new Capital One Venture cardholders can earn a $250 credit in addition to a welcome bonus.

html:
Credit Cards

Capital One Brings Back Venture’s $1K Bonus, Plus JetBlue Transfers

Many or all of the products on this page are from partners who compensate us when you click to or take an action on their website, but this does not influence our evaluations or ratings. Our opinions are our own.

Published Feb 18, 2025 11:29 a.m. PST

Senior Writer/Spokesperson

Capital One is bringing back a generous welcome offer for the Capital One Venture Rewards Credit Card, while also growing its list of airline transfer partners to include JetBlue.

The new welcome bonus

Beginning Feb. 18, 2025, new cardholders can get a bonus worth $1,000 in travel for a limited time:

  • A one-time $250 credit, which can be used to book flights, hotels, vacation rentals and rental cards through Capital One Travel. This credit is valid for a year.

  • 75,000 bonus miles (worth $750 in travel) after spending $4,000 in three months. 

The $95-annual-fee Capital One Venture Rewards Credit Card last offered this bonus-credit combo from July 16 to Sept. 9, 2024. The card also earns:

  • 5 miles per $1 spent on hotels, vacation rentals, and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel.

  • 2 miles per $1 on all other purchases.

An additional transfer partner

After a few years apart, JetBlue is rejoining Capital One’s lengthy roster of airline and hotel partners, and it’s the only U.S.-based carrier on that list.

Capital One miles will transfer to JetBlue at a 5:3 ratio. This means that 2,000 Capital One miles will convert to 1,200 TrueBlue points.

NerdWallet values TrueBlue points at 1.5 cents each.

Full list of Capital One transfer partners

Airlines

  • Aeromexico (1:1 ratio).

  • Air Canada (1:1 ratio).

  • Air France-KLM (1:1 ratio).

  • Avianca (1:1 ratio).

  • British Airways (1:1 ratio).

  • Cathay Pacific (1:1 ratio).

  • Emirates (1:1 ratio).

  • Etihad (1:1 ratio).

  • EVA (2:1.5 ratio).

  • Finnair (1:1 ratio).

  • Qantas (1:1 ratio).

  • Singapore Airlines (1:1 ratio).

  • TAP Air Portugal (1:1 ratio).

  • Turkish Airlines (1:1 ratio).

  • Virgin Red (1:1 ratio)

Hotels

  • Accor (2:1 ratio).

  • Choice Privileges Hotels (1:1 ratio).

  • Wyndham Rewards (1:1 ratio).

Capital One Cards from our Partners

Capital One Venture Rewards Credit Card

Rewards rate

2x-5x

Earn unlimited 2X miles on every purchase, every day. Earn 5X miles on hotels, vacation rentals and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel, where you'll get Capital One's best prices on thousands of trip options

Miles

Intro offer

75,000

Enjoy $250 to use on Capital One Travel in your first cardholder year, plus earn 75,000 bonus miles once you spend $4,000 on purchases within the first 3 months from account opening - that’s equal to $1,000 in travel.

Miles

Capital One Venture X Rewards Credit Card

Rewards rate

2x-10x

Earn unlimited 10X miles on hotels and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel and 5X miles on flights and vacation rentals booked through Capital One Travel, Earn unlimited 2X miles on all other purchases.

Miles

Intro offer

75,000

Earn 75,000 bonus miles when you spend $4,000 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening, equal to $750 in travel.

Miles

Capital One Savor Cash Rewards Credit Card

Rewards rate

1%-8%

Earn unlimited 3% cash back at grocery stores (excluding superstores like Walmart® and Target®), on dining, entertainment and popular streaming services, plus 1% on all other purchases. Earn 8% cash back on Capital One Entertainment purchases. Earn unlimited 5% cash back on hotels and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel. Terms apply.

Cashback

Intro offer

$200

Earn a one-time $200 cash bonus once you spend $500 on purchases within the first 3 months from account opening.
